Alle übrigen Verwertungsrechte bleiben hiervon unberührt – ebenso wie das Recht zur Vergabe einer Open-Content-Lizenz.

In the course of making the works publicly available, third parties are permitted to use and reproduce the works published on CrossAsia exclusively for academic, private and other personal use (§§ 53, 60c, 60d UrhG). You undertake to indemnify the Staatsbibliothek zu Berlin - Preußischer Kulturbesitz against all claims of third parties, and affirm that you have obtained the consent of all persons involved in its creation, to use the respective work based on this declaration.
